title: URLScraper (Firefox Add-on)
blurb: One-click extract, dedupe, filter, and export of all links on a page â€” local-only, privacy-friendly.
description: URLScraper is a lightweight Firefox WebExtension that harvests links from the current tab (anchors, media sources, iframe src, background-image URLs, and selectable text). It normalizes and de-duplicates the results, lets you apply include/exclude patterns or same-host rules, and exports to clipboard, CSV, NDJSON, or plaintext. All processing is local by default; optional host permissions enable per-site rules.

versions.notes: Adds NDJSON export, regex filters, and domain allow/deny lists.
Initial alpha: popup scrape, dedupe, copy/export plaintext.
